title: Claude could look at this directly
detail: A picture is worth a thousand words—and Claude can see them. Screenshots, diagrams, photos, charts—upload them directly and ask Claude to interpret, analyze, or respond. Describing visual content takes effort and loses detail; sharing it is instant and complete.
surface_triggers: User describes something visual. User asks about an image, screenshot, or diagram. User tries to explain something that would be easier to show. User references visual content without sharing it.
